name: Musical Relic
description:
Inspired from 14th-century monuments in Hampi's Musical Pillars, they release rhythmic sounds close to SaReGaMa(Indian Music), if we hit the pillar with sandal wood. 

A Lightship VPS Challenge Submission. Use your hand to generate drum beats by touching the relic. This is a Lightship VPS AR hand-tracking experience. Need to physically present at Niantic Office location 411 108th Ave NE, Bellevue, WA 98004, United States.
